author: potuz
content: Given the discussion in <#745077610685661265> and similar and the lack of hard data that I could find available I think it would be a nice project and probably not a hard one to gather statistics about state growth and database growth, both pruned and not, and from different clients. It would be even better to use this data as initial points in a simulation, with any sort of basis, to estimate dbase size based on gas limit. I think any estimation, it does not matter how arbitrary, is better than none

author: potuz
content: I figured people in this channel may be able and willing to carry this task
